full_text: Case 1:20-cr-03330-RAE Document 705 Filed 07/12/22 Page 10 of 12 I'm so excited. Maria's Boss brought me a ticket to come out & see her. It's been almost a year - scary. He is very wealthy & might help me get into or pay for college. I don't want to get my hopes up because I hate disappointment but it would be really cool if it happened & even if it doesn't it is so great I get to go see him. Property of Annie Farmer - Not For Media Use AFARMER00010472 DOJ-OGR-00011250

text_blocks.content: I'm so excited. Maria's Boss brought me a ticket to come out & see her. It's been almost a year - scary. He is very wealthy & might help me get into or pay for college. I don't want to get my hopes up because I hate disappointment but it would be really cool if it happened & even if it doesn't it is so great I get to go see him.
Property of Annie Farmer - Not For Media Use

additional_notes: The document is a handwritten note on lined paper, likely from a notebook. The handwriting is clear and legible. There are no visible redactions or damage to the document.
